summary.span: 命名空間包含的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic 2008。

span.span: The namespace contains functions and objects provided use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic 2008。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 .NET Framework 實作有顯著差異時，才會需要這些函式和物件。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.
